application.model

Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.model.World
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class World
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The class used to control the simulation part of the program like the ball and the obstacles and make sure they interact
    Author:
    samarthshah
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      World(MainScreenController main)
      Creates a new world with a new ball, canvas, and obstacles for the edges of the window, and a new animation timer

        Parameters:
        x - The first x value of the line
        y - The first y value of the line
        angle - The angle of the obstacle
        length - The length of the obstacle
